Charges.name: Aiding and Abetting
Charges.description: Joint commission or participation in the same crime.

Charges.name: Aiding a Prison Break
Charges.description: Succeeding in helping, or attempting to help, a prisoner break out of the Castille Correction Facility.

Charges.name: Assault
Charges.description: An unlawful threat by word or act against another with the apparent ability to do so.

Charges.name: Attempted Murder
Charges.description: Attempting to cause life threatening harm with such intent or deliberation to another person.

Charges.name: Battery
Charges.description: Intentionally touching, striking, or causing bodily harm to another person.

Charges.name: Brandishing a Weapon in Public
stacks: Discharge Of a Firearm in Public
Charges.description: Walking around with a Prohibited Melee Weapon, or aiming any Firearm in an area accessible to the general public without lawful justification. Prohibited melee weapons: Knife, Katana, Knuckles

Charges.name: Bribery
Charges.description: Attempting to bribe a Law Enforcement Officer for freedom.

Charges.name: Conspiracy
stacks: Discharge Of a Firearm in Public
Operating a Vehicle Without a License
Charges.description: A mutual agreement between two or more people to commit an illegal act.

Charges.name: Criminal Trespassing
Charges.description: Entering a Government Facility or a restricted area without permission.

Charges.name: Destruction of Public Property
Charges.description: Vandalizing any public/government property (i.e. fences, traffic lights, cones, trash cans)

Charges.name: Discharge Of a Firearm in Public
Charges.description: Shooting a Firearm in Public without due care and authorization.

Charges.name: Disturbance of Peace
Charges.description: Engaging in unruly behaviour, Creating dangerous situations in a public place.

Charges.name: Driving Over the Speed Limit
Charges.description: Driving in excess of the speed limit.

Charges.name: Evading a Law Enforcement Officer
Charges.description: Preventing, or attempting to prevent, a Law Enforcement Officer from effecting an arrest or search using a vehicle.

Charges.name: Extortion
Charges.description: Intimidating, influencing, or forcing someone to hand over any property or render services.

Charges.name: Failure to Identify
Charges.description: Failure to provide a Law Enforcement Officer with the full name and proper identification when asked.

Charges.name: Failure to Pay a Ticket
Charges.description: Failure to pay a ticket issued by a Law Enforcement Officer.

Charges.name: Flight Protocol Violation
Charges.description: Violating provisions of the Flight Code as provided in the Penal Code: An aircraft may not hover over a government facility or residential/commercial areas at a low altitude. The airstrips at the Los Santos, Las Venturas and San Fierro Airports may not be used for any other purpose other than its designated use for facilitating aircrafts. The airstrip at Abandoned Airport may be used to host events or sanctioned races subject to restrictions imposed by the Ares Defence Solutions

Charges.name: Fraud
Charges.description: Causing personal gain or loss to another by deception.

Charges.name: Grand Theft Auto
Charges.description: Attempting to or succeeding in stealing another vehicle.

Charges.name: Impersonating a Government Employee
Charges.description: Falsely representing oneself as a government employee.

Charges.name: Indecency
Charges.description: Exposing one's naked body, or genitals, in public view.

Charges.name: Kidnapping
Charges.description: Forcibly abducting or imprisoning another person against their will.

Charges.name: Misuse of Emergency Hotline
Charges.description: A prank or false call to the the emergency services line (911).

Charges.name: Mutual Combat
Charges.description: Engaging in a consensual fight in an area accessible to public or in the public view.

Charges.name: Murder
Charges.description: Unlawful killing of another person with premeditation.

Charges.name: Obstructing a Government Employee
Charges.description: Any attempt at preventing a Government Employee from performing their lawful duties or influencing any proceedings by unlawful means.

Charges.name: Operating a Vehicle Without a License
Charges.description: Operating a vehicle or sitting in the driver seat of a vehicle without a state-issued driving license.

Charges.name: Pandering/Pimping
Charges.description: Soliciting a person or persons services as a prostitute.

Charges.name: Possession Of a Controlled Substance
Charges.description: Having on one's person or property: Any amount of Crack, 51 or more grams of Pot

Charges.name: Possession Of an Illegal Firearm
Charges.description: Having in one's possession an Illegal Firearm: Silenced Pistol, Desert Eagle, SPAS-12, MP5, M4, AK-47, Tec9, Mac-10, Sniper Rifle

Charges.name: Prison Break
Charges.description: Breaking out of the Castille Correction Facility.

Charges.name: Prostitution
Charges.description: Offering or exchanging sexual favours for any personal gain.

Charges.name: Reckless Driving
Charges.description: Driving with a general disregard for road safety of oneself and of others.

Charges.name: Resisting a Law Enforcement Officer
Charges.description: Preventing, or attempting to prevent, a Law Enforcement Officer from effecting an arrest or search by non-vehicular means.

Charges.name: Riot
Charges.description: Two or more people, acting without legal authority, disturb the peace, encourage violence, or cause civil unrest in a public area.

Charges.name: Robbery
Charges.description: Using intimidation, threats, or weapons to take property the possession of another person.

Charges.name: Sexual Assault
Charges.description: Attempting to or succeeding at having forceable sexual intercourse with another person.

Charges.name: Sexual Battery
Charges.description: Touching the intimate parts of another person unlawfully and without their consent.

Charges.name: Terrorism
Charges.description: A person who uses threats or actions against the public to cause fear and intimidation at a large scale.

Charges.name: Torture
Charges.description: Any act carried out with the intention to cause severe physical or mental pain or suffering.

Charges.name: Transporting Illegal Goods
Charges.description: Delivering illegal goods including controlled substances, weapons and illegal materials.

Charges.name: Trespassing
Charges.description: Entering private property without explicit permission from the property owner.

Charges.name: Unlawful Assembly
Charges.description: Refusing to leave a public property upon lawful orders by a Law Enforcement Officer.

Charges.name: Unlawful Distribution Of a Weapon
Charges.description: The sale, distribution, manufacture or procurement of a Weapon other than through a registered Arms and Ammunition Store.

Charges.name: Vandalism
Charges.description: Intentional damage to another's property.

Charges.name: Vehicular Assault
Charges.description: Reckless operation of a vehicle followed by an attempt to cause any injury or succeeding in causing any injury to a pedestrian.

Charges.name: Vigilantism
Charges.description: Preventing, investigating, and punishing offenses and crimes without lawful authority.
